abstract: David Liss reviews young adult novel Genius: The Game by Leopoldo Gout.

headline.main: Young People From Around the World Compete for High Stakes in ‘Genius: The Game’

snippet: A young adult novel brings together three internet friends from around the world to participate in a high-stakes competition....
lead_paragraph: A young adult novel brings together three internet friends from around the world to participate in a high-stakes competition.
